snippet: President Mohamed Morsi should delay the vote on the draft constitution as a step toward resolving the nation’s latest crisis.
abstract: Editorial urges Egyptian pres Mohamed Morsi to delay vote on draft constitution as step toward resolving crisis in country; calls on Morsi to rescind his dictatorial edict placing himself above law.
lead_paragraph: President Mohamed Morsi should delay the vote on the draft constitution as a step toward resolving the nation’s latest crisis.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
